instructions:
Instructions

This should be all about Pounded yam
ingredients:
Stuff to go into the making

Pounded, pounded yam I say
about: Pounded Yam is one of the Nigerian fufu recipes that is eaten with the various Nigerian soup recipes. The most popular combinations are Pounded Yam with Egusi Soup. Alternatively Pounded Yam can be prepared by stirring yam flour in hot water.
